title: I turned off a "True Key" add on.  How do I get it turned on again?
content: I turned off a "True Key" add on. How do I get it turned on again?
creator: kmc.212

title: Firefox opens but remains blank & unresponsive
content:
Firefox seems attacked & hacked -- app opens but loads neither online nor local content. All else operates normally. 5-yo Dell Inspiron 5559, W10 build 19042.1052.

A surprise unsolicited add-on update -- allegedly of Video Download Helper-- is highly suspected. However, coincidentally, I had just uninstalled MS Office 365 and One Drive, and the first indication of trouble was persistence of startup error notification, "Cannot open /cannot locate vcruntime140.dll," though ostensibly, it was indeed properly in the directory folder. Signs pointed to a contaminated Visual C++ runtime error but its reinstallation netted nothing.

FF Options & Settings are not accessible but Bookmarks & History are. (2) re-installations netted no change except at #2, bookmarks toolbar shifted left-justified from center, the smaller secondary Search window with its dropdown search-engine options disappeared, and my default DDG engine was replaced by Gewgoyle after allowing popup offering "a fresh look."

Thank you.
creator: ssenour

title: how  can I copy my firefox profile from my Windows PC's external SSD to my Macbook Pro?
content:
My windows pc died. I removed the SSD and have it plugged into my MACBookPro, trying to copy my firefox profile into my MAC, but the instructions online are not clear and I can't find my Profile in my external Windows 10 SSD, to copy it onto my MACBook Pro's Desktop and then to copy my profile it into the Firefox on my MACBook Pro.

Can anyone help me?
creator: DrHeshie
